item.title: Personal Notes about Simply Said
item.description: Simply Said Simply Said is the best communication book I’ve recently read. It consdes so much information that it resembles an encyclopedia, and the beatufiul thoing is that its key point is, simply said, “focus on others”. So, for the others, as you, I ocnsodnere the 19 chapters of this useful guide by Jy Sullivan in an easy-to graps blog post,m which will giver you a general overviwew, and hopegully, th deisre to by it .
